synopsis:
LNMIIT Quiz Club organizes thrilling quizzing events making our fests a terrific platform for avid quizzers and inquisitive minds to show their mettle to battle.

This year we will be organising The Quest- general quiz covering all the topics from sports to entertainment, current affairs to history, business to technical knowledge.

Get ready to face the utlimate battle of wits to prove your knowledge among all the quizzers of the country.
eventDescription:
1. The Quest will be held in 2 rounds, both these rounds will take place back to back at LNMIIT during Plinth.
  2. The initial round (Prelims) will be a written elimination round. Each team should consist of exactly 2 members.
  3. The final (mains) round will be between the top 6 teams from Prelims.
  4. The decision of Quizmaster will be final and binding.
rules:
General Rules

  1. This event is open to all undergraduate and post graduate students.
  2. The team should comprise of exactly 2 members.
  3. An individual can be a part of only one registered team.
  4. There is no cap on the number of teams registered per institute.
  5. The decisions of the organizers of the contest will be final and binding on all the participants.
  6. Quiz master is god.
